translation.en: And it looks like gangs are in.

translation.es: - Cuando la corrupción pública... - Un importante aumento en... La nostalgia prometió convertirse,

translation.es: una importante reducción de los precios... No hay factores de aumento desde los 60 y una vez...

translation.es: La cultura básica de la violencia es parte de los chicos que...

translation.en: - Tom, what's happening? - You all right, Danny?
Yo, don't say I never do nothing for ya.
translation.es: No digas que nunca hago cosas por ti.

translation.en: Oh, sweet.
- Who's that? - I didn't say it weren't secondhand.
translation.es: - ¿Quién es? - No dije que no fuera usado.

translation.en: This morning, we're gonna go over your revision sheets
translation.es: Esta mañana repasaremos sus hojas de revisión

translation.en: and take a look at exam prep.
If we don't hit the 60 percent pass rate,
translation.es: Si no llegan al 60% para aprobar,

translation.en: we're gonna be spending a lot more time together in queue at the job center.
translation.es: pasarán mucho más tiempo juntos en fila en el centro de empleo. Tom, ¿cómo te fue con los ejercicios?

translation.en: So, Tom, how did you get on with the exercises?
translation.es: Tom, ¿cómo te fue con los ejercicios?

translation.en: - Triangles? - What? Okay, Eileen, what about you?
Yeah, it was all right. One thing I didn't under...
translation.es: Sí, estuvo bien. Algo que no...

translation.en: Man, it's painful watching you sometimes.
- What? - This.
Everyone knows you've fancied Lucy Walker since forever.
translation.es: Todo el mundo sabe que siempre te gustó Lucy Walker.

translation.en: Just man up and get it done, all right?
Ooh, here she comes. This could be your big chance to impress her.
translation.es: Ahí viene. Podría ser tu oportunidad de impresionarla.

translation.en: So, make sure you say something really, really cool.
translation.es: Asegúrate de decir algo muy genial.

translation.en: - Go away, please. - Tom.
- Hey. - Uh, did you get the science revision?
- Yeah. - No, I mean, like, did you get it?
- Oh, did I get it? Yeah, I think so. - Cool.
translation.es: - ¿Si la entendí? Sí, eso creo. - Genial.

translation.en: Look at Tommy boy. He's getting moist just talking to a girl.
translation.es: Mírenlo a Tommy. Se moja solo de hablar con una chica.

translation.en: - Still a dickhead, Eugene? - What are you looking at?
translation.es: - Sigues siendo un imbécil, Eugene. - ¿Qué miras?

translation.en: Fuck off.
So, anyway, um, the science revision.
translation.es: Te decía, la revisión de ciencia...

translation.en: I, uh, was wondering if you could help me 'cause I tried looking at it,
translation.es: Quería saber si podías ayudarme porque intenté mirarla

translation.en: and then I remembered I haven't paid attention in science since, like, 2011.
translation.es: y recordé que no presto atención a la clase de ciencia desde el 2011.

translation.en: I'll see what I can do.
I mean, I can only work with what I got. You're not exactly a model student.
translation.es: Trabajo con lo que tengo. No eres lo que se dice una estudiante modelo.

translation.en: - Are you questioning my academic prowess? - I am, yeah.
translation.es: ¿Cuestionas mis habilidades académicas? Sí, así es.

translation.en: All right, well, I'm seeing Charlie after school, but come by later, yeah?
translation.es: Veré a Charlie después de la escuela, pero pasa más tarde, ¿sí?

translation.en: Sure.
- Charlie Gibbs or Charlie Penford? - Uh, Charlie Gibbs. As in Charlotte?
translation.es: - ¿Charlie Gibbs o Charlie Penford? - Charlie Gibbs, de Charlotte.

translation.en: I haven't seen Charlie Penford in months.
translation.es: Hace meses que no veo a Charlie Penford.

translation.en: Right, of course. I mean, it's none of my business, obviously.
translation.es: Claro. Obviamente no es asunto mío.

translation.en: I'll see you later then.
See you, Lucy, later-- See you later, Lucy.
translation.es: Después, Lucy, nos vemos... Nos vemos después, Lucy.

translation.en: Put here some vegetable stock--
translation.es: Pongan un poco de caldo de vegetales...

translation.en: Police investigation con--
What are you so fidgety about?
If someone said for you to come around later,
translation.es: Si alguien te dijera que pasaras más tarde,

translation.en: what time would you say that was?
- Later than what? - Than earlier.
translation.es: - ¿Más tarde que qué? - Que más temprano.

translation.en: Like, eight, do you think, maybe?
Well, that's certainly later on than earlier.
translation.es: Eso es más tarde que más temprano.

translation.en: - What you writing? - A romance novel.
- They're all romance novels. - Yes, they are.
translation.es: - Todas son novelas románticas. - Sí, lo son.

translation.en: Would you like to hear some?
I don't think so.
- Philip... - Oh, Nan.
...closed the door behind him and undid the buttons of his shirt.
translation.es: ...cerró la puerta detrás de él y se desabrochó los botones de la camisa.

translation.en: He unbuckled his belt and released his engorged--
translation.es: Se desabrochó el cinturón y liberó su hinchado...

Lucy?
- - Let's go, man.
Hey! Stop!
Emergency. Which service?
Nan?
This is your phone.
Did it miss all the important bits? Well, it's a brain,
translation.es: - ¿No le dio a las partes importantes? - Bueno, es un cerebro.

translation.en: so we tend to think of all of it as quite important.
translation.es: Nos inclinamos a creer que todas las partes son importantes.

translation.en: - But it will be okay? - We hope so.
Fragments here and here missed the temporal lobe

translation.es: no le dio al lóbulo temporal y el complejo auditivo por unos...

translation.en: Is my friend in here?
Lucy's gone home, love. She was discharged about a week ago.
translation.es: Lucy se fue a casa, cariño. Le dieron de alta hace una semana.

translation.en: You've been out for nearly ten days, Tom.
translation.es: Estuviste inconsciente casi diez días, Tom.

translation.en: At the moment,
translation.es: En este momento, no hay nada ahí adentro que se mueva

translation.en: nothing in there is moving around in any way that worries us.
translation.es: En este momento, no hay nada ahí adentro que se mueva de ninguna manera que nos preocupe. Tuviste mucha suerte.

translation.en: - You were very lucky. - Will there be, like, side effects?
translation.es: de ninguna manera que nos preocupe. Tuviste mucha suerte. - ¿Habrá efectos secundarios? - Te mantendremos controlado.

translation.en: We're gonna keep an eye on you, but if anything unusual happens,
translation.es: - ¿Habrá efectos secundarios? - Te mantendremos controlado. Pero si pasa algo inusual, quiero que me avises de inmediato.

translation.en: I want you to let me know straightaway.
translation.es: Pero si pasa algo inusual, quiero que me avises de inmediato.

translation.en: - Unusual, like, how? - Just unusual.
I should've done something. You did the only thing you could, love.
translation.es: - Debí hacer algo. - Hiciste lo único que podías, cariño.

translation.en: - Have you seen her? - No.
It'll take a while, Tom.
Is there something about my grandson you find particularly fascinating?
translation.es: ¿Mi nieto tiene algo que le parezca fascinante?

translation.en: - No, no, no. - Well, stop bloody staring at him, then.
Looks like he's been in the wars.
translation.es: Parece que estuvo en la guerra.

translation.en: Well, thank you for your considered medical opinion.
translation.es: Gracias por su considerada opinión médica.

translation.en: Maybe, next time, I'll get the doctor to drive us and you to do the operation.
translation.es: La próxima vez le pediré al doctor que nos lleve y a usted que haga la operación, ¿qué le parece?

translation.en: - How about that? - Calm down, love.
translation.es: y a usted que haga la operación, ¿qué le parece? Cálmese. Es solo una observación.

translation.en: It's only an observation.
So, how you feeling?
- How's the head? - It's all right.
- How's it look? - Already, it looks better.
We need to even this up a bit.
You know, if you feel up to it, maybe later you should go to Lucy.
translation.es: Si tienes ganas, quizá más tarde deberías ir a ver a Lucy.

translation.en: - No, she's not gonna want to see me. - Of course, she is.
translation.es: - No, no querrá verme. - Claro que sí.

translation.en: I ran away, Nan.
Anyone could be forgiven for running out of that flat, Tom.
translation.es: Cualquiera que huyera de ese departamento sería perdonado, Tom.

translation.en: But someone who kept running afterwards when she really needed them?
translation.es: ¿Pero alguien que siguiera corriendo cuando realmente lo necesitara?

translation.en: That would be a coward.
I mean, what a fucking asshole. Who says that?
I mean, come on. He said he was gonna call me. Then, when I saw him, he said he was out of credit.
translation.es: Vamos. Dijo que iba a llamarme, y cuando lo vi, dijo que no tenía crédito.

translation.en: - I know. He's on a contract. -
Yeah, I know for a fact he's definitely on a contract.
translation.es: Sí, estoy segura de que tiene un plan.

translation.en: - Right? - Yeah. Oh, my God, what a prick.
Now, some boy is staring at me.
translation.es: Ahora un chico me está mirando.

translation.en: - Oh, shit, it's that kid they shot. - How's he look?
translation.es: - Es el chico al que le dispararon. - ¿Cómo está?

translation.en: Not good.
- What floor you want? - Five.
Nice flowers. For your nan?
Oh, you look like shit.
Say hello to Lucy from us, yeah?
translation.es: Saluda a Lucy de parte nuestra.

translation.en: Let me go and check on her first, all right?
translation.es: Primero déjame ir a ver cómo está.

translation.en: You all right, Ben?
You all right, Tom?
Lamela. Back to Walker.
She's in her room, Tom.
I'm glad you're not dead.
translation.es: Me alegra que no estés muerto.

translation.en: Thanks.
Same.
They've given you lots of drugs?
Yeah, must've done. Things have been a bit trippy.
translation.es: Sí, deben de haberlo hecho, me estuve sintiendo un poco volado.

translation.en: - I'm sorry, Luce. - It's okay.
No, it's... it's not.
They won't get away with it.
translation.es: No se van a salir con la suya.

translation.en: They already have.
I should've done something.
- Yeah? Like what? - I shouldn't have run.
No one's mad at you for not being a hero.
translation.es: Nadie está enojado contigo por no ser un héroe.

translation.en: Tom?
- Tom? - I'm fine, Nan.
You're frightening me.
- I'm gonna call the doctor. - I'm fine, seriously.
translation.es: - Llamaré al doctor. - Estoy bien, de veras.

translation.en: I just need to get some sleep.
- There he is. - Morning.
- You sleep all right, love? - Yeah, good.
All right. Well, you look better. How was Lucy yesterday?
Different.
Yeah. So were you.
Keep thinking if your mum was still with us, she'd be out there now, kicking doors down,
translation.es: Pienso que si tu mamá aún viviera, habría salido a patear todas las puertas

translation.en: trying to find the little bastards that did that to you.
translation.es: para encontrar a los malditos que te hicieron esto.

translation.en: Tom!
- What are you doing? - It's Monday.
You've just been shot in the head.
translation.es: Acaban de dispararte en la cabeza.

translation.en: I think they'll give you a bit of time off school.
translation.es: Creo que te darán tiempo libre en la escuela.

translation.en: It's exams... or doom.
translation.es: Es tomar los exámenes o condena eterna.

translation.en: Well, stay out of trouble.
Shit. You took a head shot and you're already walking.
translation.es: - Tranquilo. - Mierda. Te dispararon en la cabeza y ya caminas.

translation.en: Is it true they had to pull bits of phone outta your brain?
translation.es: ¿Es verdad que te sacaron pedacitos de teléfono del cerebro?

translation.en: - Left most of it in there, I think. - Mate, I am...
translation.es: Creo que dejaron casi todo. Amigo, me alegra que no seas un vegetal.

translation.en: - I am glad you ain't a vegetable. -
translation.es: Amigo, me alegra que no seas un vegetal.

translation.en: - Thanks, Danny. - Wait, I know you're not going to school.
translation.es: - Gracias, Danny. - Espera, sé que no irás a la escuela.

translation.en: - I thought I might. - Head trauma is wasted on you, mate.
translation.es: - Iba a ir. - Desperdicias un golpe en la cabeza.

translation.en: Danny, can I ask you something?
I don't know anything about it. No one on the estate does.
translation.es: No sé nada de eso. Nadie por aquí sabe.

translation.en: Yeah, but--
Bruv, just forget about it now and move on.
- - I think Eugene was there. Eugene? Come on, man.
translation.es: - Creo que Eugene estaba ahí. - ¿Eugene? Por favor, amigo.

translation.en: The guy wants to be a bad boy, but he's got a line, you know?
translation.es: Quiere ser un chico malo, pero tiene un límite.

translation.en: - Yeah, but what if he was? What do I do? - Look, he wasn't there.
translation.es: - Sí, ¿pero y si estaba? ¿Qué hago? - Mira, no estaba ahí.

translation.en: That's all there is to it. Come on.
- Tom? Tom! - Huh?
Did you hear what I said? Party tonight.
translation.es: ¿Oíste lo que dije? Fiesta esta noche.

translation.en: - Oh. Hadn't heard about it. - Yeah, he might not have invited you.
translation.es: - No me enteré. - Sí, quizá no te invitó.

translation.en: Everyone still thinks you're in a coma now.
translation.es: Todos creen que estás en coma.

translation.en: - Right. - But you should come.
- What? You're not going to school? - They've done all they can for me, son.
translation.es: - ¿No irás a la escuela? - Ya hicieron todo lo posible por mí.

translation.en: - But I'll see you there, yeah? - In a bit.
translation.es: - Nos vemos allí, ¿sí? - En un rato.

translation.en: No!
- Ah, fuck. -
- Eugene, put that away now. - Shut up, man!
Excuse me, everyone. Quiet down.
- It's funny, innit? - Eugene.
You know what else is funny? I know where you live, you little--

translation.en: - Bruv, you made it. - Yeah.
How you feeling? How's your head?
What the fuck you staring at, Tom?
What you staring at, Tom?
- What the fuck are you-- ? - All right, Eugene.
- Chill out, bruv. Hey, just chill out. - Get him out of here now.
translation.es: - Tranquilo, hermano. Tranquilo. - Sácalo de aquí ahora.

translation.en: - Relax. Chill out. - Take him back to Nanny, bruv.
translation.es: - Relájate. Tranquilo. - Llévalo con su abuela.

translation.en: - I'll sort it. Just chill. - Yeah, yeah, yeah, sort it, Danny.
What's the matter with you?
Do you want another hole in your head?
You start a fight in there, you ain't gonna win it.
translation.es: Si empiezas una pelea aquí, no ganarás.

translation.en: They were there.
- What you talking about? - At Lucy's.
translation.es: - ¿De qué hablas? - En lo de Lucy.

translation.en: When are you gonna get it through your head that this wasn't them?
translation.es: ¿Cuándo vas a entender que no fueron ellos?

translation.en: You talk like you're not one of them.
translation.es: ¿Cuándo vas a entender que no fueron ellos? Hablas como si no fueras uno de ellos.

translation.en: I know they've already got you selling. What, you think this won't escalate?
translation.es: Sé que ya te hacen vender. ¿Qué? ¿Crees que no va a seguir aumentando?

translation.en: Don't be a dickhead about it, Tom.
translation.es: No seas un idiota con eso, Tom.

translation.en: I'm doing what I want.
You get that? You know what? One day, it'll be me at the top giving out orders,
translation.es: ¿Entiendes? ¿Sabes qué? Un día, estaré arriba, dando órdenes.

translation.en: and it won't be none of this shit, just business.
translation.es: Y no será nada de esta mierda, solo negocios.

translation.en: Tom, I can't always be there, you know.
translation.es: Tom, no puedo estar siempre ahí.

translation.en: - You smell like weed. -
You got any?
- Comes out here empty- handed. - Sorry.
translation.es: - ¿Quién viene con las manos vacías? - Lo siento.

translation.en: - How was the party? - It was all right. Didn't miss much.
translation.es: - ¿Qué tal estuvo la fiesta? - Bien. No te perdiste mucho.

translation.en: How you feeling?
Good.
Yeah?
- Yeah. - That's good.
Maybe you'll be able to come back to school soon.
translation.es: Quizá puedas volver pronto a la escuela.

translation.en: - Yeah, maybe. - Boring without you there.
translation.es: - Sí, quizá. - Es aburrida sin ti.

translation.en: - Like you'd ever dare throw chips at me. - Yeah, what would you do about it?
translation.es: - Como si alguna vez te animaras. - Sí, ¿qué harías?

translation.en: Give you a slap, obviously.
You'd have to find a chair to stand on first.
translation.es: Te daría una cachetada, claro. Primero tendrías que buscar una silla para pararte.

translation.en: You're gonna regret all this talk when I'm owning you in front of everyone.

translation.en: Okay. I wouldn't mind that so much.
translation.es: Está bien. No me molestaría tanto.

translation.en: It's gonna be all right, you know.
Yeah.

Cool, yeah?

He's cool. Listen. All right, Cutz. He's cool.
- Don't worry about him. - Are you sure?

- Safe, Cutz. - Safe.
Wow, that was exactly the same time, you know?

- I'll bell you. - Safe, Cutz.
Let's go.

Weirdo.

Thank-- Shh! Hush! Thank you.
So, for this morning's thought of the day,
translation.es: PLANES PARA EL FUTURO Para el pensamiento del día de hoy,

translation.en: we will be discussing with you future planning.
translation.es: hablaremos sobre los planes para el futuro.

translation.en: Now, as you know, many of the top here will be, uh, taking their exams soon.
translation.es: Como saben, muchos de los mayores de aquí tomarán sus exámenes pronto.

translation.en: Much sooner than many of them would like.
translation.es: Mucho más pronto de lo que ellos querrían, pero...

translation.en: - Hey, yo, that's you. - But it's always at this-- Shh!
translation.es: Mucho más pronto de lo que ellos querrían, pero... - Siempre... - ¿Por qué apareces en el video?

translation.en: It's always at this time of year,
translation.es: Siempre, en esta época del año,

translation.en: as we prepare to say bye- bye to some of you,
translation.es: cuando nos preparamos para despedirnos de algunos de ustedes,

translation.en: that my thoughts turn to... to what lies ahead of us on the road to...
translation.es: mis pensamientos se dirigen a lo que nos espera en los caminos...

As we-- Quiet, please!
Boys, stay calm! Just sit down!
Sit! I said sit down!
Control yourselves!
Everybody, quiet!
Oh, my good God! Stop the video!
Stop the fucking video! Get them out!
Take it down! Everybody out! Out!
Mr. Harris was just standing there
translation.es: El Sr. Harris estaba ahí parado

translation.en: with this huge projection of Cass behind him just jerking off.
translation.es: y atrás de él había una enorme proyección de Cass masturbándose.

God, how did that even happen?
Don't know.

Well, she's got interesting taste.

- - Do you want to go to dinner?
- Dinner? - Yeah, food or something.
- Yeah, okay. - Okay.
Great.
Yeah, well, I'm sorry, but our system is a hundred percent accurate.
translation.es: Sí, lo siento. No, nuestro sistema es 100% preciso.

translation.en: You've missed your payments, which total 600 pounds, so--
translation.es: No realizó sus pagos por un total de 600 libras, así que...

translation.en: Oh, oh, let's just all bow down to whatever your system says, shall we?

translation.en: Can you check it again for me?
Look, if you can pay the 600 now,
then we can stop the added interest on the account,
translation.es: podemos detener los intereses en la cuenta.

translation.en: but until then, my hands are tied.
translation.es: Hasta entonces, mis manos están atadas.

translation.en: Young man, I don't have 600 pounds.
translation.es: Hasta entonces, mis manos están atadas. Jovencito, no tengo 600 libras.

translation.en: I don't have 300 pounds.
You have my 300 pounds, but you've lost it.
translation.es: Usted tiene mis 300 libras, pero las perdió. Quiero hablar con...

- Hold on a minute. -
Right.
I don't reckon I could live on a canal boat.
translation.es: Creo que no podría vivir en un bote en el canal.

translation.en: - Why not? - It's too low down.
I really like being able to see all of the city and the little people out my window.
translation.es: Me gusta poder ver toda la ciudad y las personitas por la ventana.

translation.en: Plus, ducks are weird.
- Shit, they're coming. - No!
- Quack! - Stop it! I'll kick you in.
It's actually really nice getting out of the flat for a little bit.
translation.es: Es lindo salir un rato del departamento.

translation.en: My mum just watches me constantly.
translation.es: Mi mamá me mira todo el tiempo.

translation.en: It's like she thinks I'm gonna throw myself off the balcony or something.
translation.es: Es como si pensara que me voy a lanzar del balcón o algo.

translation.en: I've never been the victim.
It doesn't feel right.
- I don't see you like that. - Yeah, you do.
translation.es: - No lo veo así. - Sí, lo ves.

translation.en: But it's all right.
You'll get there.
You know, out of everyone,
you're the only person who has come to see me.
translation.es: eres la única persona que vino a verme.

translation.en: - Luce, what happened? - Tom...
No, I... I just...
I want you to know you can...
I want you to feel safe when I'm around.
translation.es: Quiero que te sientas segura conmigo.

translation.en: What I mean is,
translation.es: Si volvemos a estar en problemas,

translation.en: if we were in trouble again, I want you to know that I wouldn't run this time.
translation.es: Si volvemos a estar en problemas, quiero que sepas que esta vez no escaparía. Me quedaría.

translation.en: I'd stay.
translation.es: quiero que sepas que esta vez no escaparía. Me quedaría.

translation.en: Even if it meant I'd die, I'd just...
I just want you to know that.
Okay.
Same.
Did I ever tell you about when I got locked out

translation.en: on your roof overnight with, uh, what's- her- face?
Do you know Alice? She sat, like, left of you in...
translation.es: Alice está a tu izquierda en...

translation.en: - ...math? - I think so.
We thought it'd be a really good idea to go and sit up there, and--
translation.es: Nos pareció buena idea ir a sentarnos ahí arriba y...

translation.en: Lucy!
- Oh, shit. - You all right?
Yeah?
Heard about what happened to you and Ben.
translation.es: Me enteré de lo que les pasó a Ben y a ti.

translation.en: That's messed up, you know. But they'll get what's coming to 'em.
translation.es: Fue horrible. Pero tendrán su merecido.

translation.en: - I promise you that. - Right.
You don't think it's nothing to do with us, do ya?
translation.es: ¿No crees que tiene algo que ver con nosotros, no?

translation.en: - Why would I think that? - No, exactly.
'Cause, you know, since it happened,
some little prick has been playing these childish games with us.
translation.es: algún idiota estuvo haciéndonos bromas infantiles.

translation.en: But you wouldn't know anything about that, would you, Luce?
translation.es: ¿No sabes nada de eso, no, Luce?

translation.en: - 'Cause I think you might-- - Leave it, Eugene.
- What about you, Tom? - What about me?
translation.es: - ¿Y qué hay de ti, Tom? - ¿Qué hay de mí?

translation.en: You've always had a thing for Lucy, ain't ya?
- And you're a geek. - I'm not a geek.
translation.es: - Y eres un ñoño. - No soy un ñoño.

translation.en: But you look like a geek.
You little shit, it's you, innit?
- What the fuck? - Got us all.
translation.es: DESCONOCIDO TIPO EQUIVOCADO, IMBÉCILES - ¿Qué mierda? - Nos tiene a todos.

translation.en: Yeah.
- Fuck, man. - Where is he?
I told you, Hazzard, bruv!
Come out! Come out now!
I'm really sorry.
Thank you for today.
This is the whip, boys.
- You know how to do this one, yeah? - Of course.
- Would sir like to take a drive? - Oh, sir would.
translation.es: - ¿El señor quiere ir a pasear? - Sí, claro.

translation.en: - Yo, start the car, Eugene, bruv. - Calm yourself down, man.
translation.es: - Enciende el coche, Eugene. - Cálmate, amigo.

translation.en: Nothing in the glove compartment, fam, not even sunglasses.
translation.es: Busca en la guantera. - Ponte las gafas de sol. - Si las tiene, están en el tablero.

translation.en: - Hey, Hazzard, check the dash, bruv. -
translation.es: - Ponte las gafas de sol. - Si las tiene, están en el tablero. - Vemos un viejo... - Está bien, amigo.

translation.en: I beg you, hurry up, bruv, or they'll be out here, man.
translation.es: Te ruego que te apures o estarán afuera.

translation.en: - Watch me start a Golf. - I've started better cars, man.
translation.es: Mira quién está empezando... Empiezo de la nada, Cass, pero no me apures...

translation.en: Don't rush me, don't--
translation.es: Empiezo de la nada, Cass, pero no me apures...

translation.en: You've started no cars, man.
- Give me that, give me that. -
translation.es: - Dame eso. - Apúrate o nos encontrarán.

translation.en: - It's different in here, man. -
translation.es: - Estarán ahí afuera. - Es diferente aquí.

translation.en: Why you locking the door? I didn't lock the fucking door, Haz, man.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué trabas la puerta? - No trabé la maldita puerta, Cass.

translation.en: - Shut your mouth. I didn't lock the door. - Oh, you didn't lock the door?
translation.es: - Cierra la boca. Yo no trabé la puerta. - ¿Ah, no?

translation.en: I swear down I didn't lock the door for fucking fuck!
translation.es: Te juro que yo no trabé la puerta, carajo.

translation.en: - I didn't lock the door! I swear to you-- -
- You started the engine. - I didn't fucking start that!
translation.es: - Estás encendiendo el motor. - ¡Yo no lo encendí!

translation.en: - So who done it, then, bruv? -
- I didn't start that! -
- I know what you did. - What the fuck? Who is that?
translation.es: - Sé lo que hicieron. - ¿Qué mierda? ¿Quién es?

translation.en: - Who the fuck are you? - Why are you revving up?
- Look at my legs, bruv! - Stop fucking revving the car, bruv!
translation.es: - Estás acelerando, mierda. - Mira mis piernas. ¡Deja de acelerar!

translation.en: Hey, yo, there's smoke coming from the car, fam!
translation.es: ¡Está saliendo humo de la parte de adelante!

translation.en: Open the fucking door! There's smoke coming out!
- Why did you attack the Walkers? - We got told to! We had no choice!
translation.es: - ¿Por qué atacaron a los Walker? - ¡Nos dijeron! ¡No tuvimos opción!

translation.en: Shut the fuck up, Cass, man!
Who told you to?
- Shut the fuck up, Cass! - It was the boss!
We didn't want to! We're sorry!
Cass, I ain't telling you again! Shut the fuck--
- Who's your boss? -
- Cover your mouth! Cover your mouth! - Haz! Haz!
- Oh, shit! - Tell me his name!
translation.es: - Mierda. - Díganme su nombre. ¡Haz explotar la maldita puerta!

translation.en: Haz is gone, man! Haz! Haz!
- Give me the name. - I ain't dying in no shitty Golf, bruv!
translation.es: - Díganme el nombre. - No voy a morir. Mierda. ¡No!

translation.en: Shut the fuck up! I told you to shut up!
The name! Now!
It was Cutz! It was Cutz!
- He made us do it! -
Yo, Keon, what you making?
What's it look like? Shepherd's pie, fam.
Yo, what's the difference between shepherd's pie and cottage pie?
translation.es: ¿Cuál es la diferencia entre pastel de carne y pastel de patatas?

translation.en: I don't know, but I would smash your mom's cottage pie.
translation.es: No lo sé, pero aplastaría el pastel de patatas de tu mamá.

translation.en: - Shut up. -
No, it's the potatoes, innit, man?
Mashed potatoes are fluffy, like sheep. Shepherd's pie.
translation.es: El puré de patatas es esponjoso como una oveja. Pastel de carne.

translation.en: Cottage pies have them square potatoes, like the roof of a cottage.
translation.es: El pastel de patatas son patatas más rústicas.

translation.en: - This guy... - Get the fuck out of here, man. - Fluffy potatoes. - Behave.
translation.es: - Qué idea de mierda, puré de patatas. - Compórtense.

translation.en: Would you lot stop talking about fucking pies?
And if you must know, the difference is lamb.
translation.es: Y si deben saber, la diferencia es el cordero.

translation.en: - - Yo, Cutz, ain't that your car?
translation.es: Y si deben saber, la diferencia es el cordero. Cutz, ¿no es tu coche?

translation.en: Yeah.
I think he's getting his dick out, bruv.
translation.es: Creo que está sacando su pene.

translation.en: - Are you lot doing this? - No, bruv.
Oh, shit, he's pissing.
Motherfucking prick! Hurry up, bruv.
Hurry up, man!
Proper fucking leather, man.
- Shut up, man. - I'm just saying, man.
Fuck.
I heard there was this guy...
...who's trying to take on the gangs, like some sort of vigilante or something.

translation.en: Yeah, heard that as well.
What an idiot.
Well, you know, maybe this is just the start.
translation.es: Bueno, quizá es solo el comienzo.

translation.en: Maybe he's gonna change this place for the better.
translation.es: Quizá cambiará este lugar para mejor.

translation.en: What? By setting fire to cars and getting into fights?
To clean this place up, he'll have to do a lot more than that.
translation.es: Para limpiar este lugar tendrá que hacer mucho más que eso.

translation.en: - You know the exams? - Mm- hmm.
Well, I haven't been back to school since...
translation.es: No volví a la escuela desde...

translation.en: And I wondered if maybe you wanted to go together.
translation.es: Y quería saber si querías ir juntos.

translation.en: - To the exams? - Like, the world's most boring date.
translation.es: - ¿A los exámenes? - La cita más aburrida del mundo.

translation.en: Okay.
What the fuck, man?
- You shouldn't go through my room. - You shouldn't have flick knives.
translation.es: - No debes revisar mi cuarto. - No debes tener navajas.

translation.en: - How about we focus on that? - This is bullshit.
translation.es: - Concentrémonos en eso. - Es una mierda.

translation.en: Innit just?
- Where do you go at night? - Walking.
- With this? - No.
Actually, I took it off someone else. That's one less knife on the street.
translation.es: En realidad, se la saqué a alguien. - Es una navaja menos en la calle. - Estás cumpliendo tu deber cívico.

translation.en: Oh. So, this is you doing your civic duty.
translation.es: - Es una navaja menos en la calle. - Estás cumpliendo tu deber cívico.

translation.en: Maybe.
What's happened to you, Tom? You never used to get into trouble,
translation.es: ¿Qué te pasó, Tom? No te metías en problemas

translation.en: and now it's all bullet wounds and knives.
translation.es: y ahora es todo heridas de bala y navajas.

translation.en: - Nan... - Well, where does it end, Tom?
I'll tell you where it ends, jail or the morgue.
translation.es: Te diré dónde termina. En la cárcel o la morgue.

translation.en: I'm trying to do something, Nan. I'm trying to do something good.
translation.es: Estoy intentando hacer algo, abuela. Algo bueno.

translation.en: No, you're not.
Things are a little out of control, wouldn't you say, Cutz?
translation.es: Las cosas están un poco fuera de control, ¿no, Cutz?

translation.en: I- I know, boss.
Half our boys are in the cells.
Ellman, I'm gonna sort this out, believe me.
It's not about what I believe. It's about what you believe.
translation.es: No se trata de lo que crea. Se trata de lo que tú crees.

translation.en: Do you believe that if you don't make this right, I'll hold you personally responsible?
translation.es: ¿Crees que si no arreglas esto te echaré la culpa a ti?

translation.en: Yeah, of course.
And do you believe that the man I hold personally responsible
translation.es: ¿Y crees que el hombre al que le eche la culpa

translation.en: won't be walking around on this Earth for very much longer?
translation.es: no andará caminando por la Tierra mucho tiempo más?

translation.en: No. No, I don't.
- Better make it right, then. - I will, Ellman, trust me.
translation.es: - ¿Lo arreglarás, entonces? - Lo haré, Ellman, créeme.

translation.en: I'm gonna sort this out as soon as possible, but--
translation.es: Resolveré esto lo más pronto posible, pero...

translation.en: - - Hello?
translation.es: Resolveré esto lo más pronto posible, pero... ¿Hola?

translation.en: I've got half my boys nicked right now.
translation.es: Ahora la mitad de mis chicos están encerrados.

translation.en: People are taking money from my account! The fucking audacity!
translation.es: Alguien tomó dinero de mi cuenta, maldito insolente.

translation.en: I need answers today! I need every piece of technology!
translation.es: Necesito respuestas hoy. Necesito todos los aparatos electrónicos.

translation.en: Laptops, phones, anything. You will knock on everyone's flat.
translation.es: Computadoras, teléfonos, todo. Van a los departamentos de todos.

translation.en: Your own mothers, your cousin, your sister, I don't give a fuck.
translation.es: Sus propias madres, sus primos, su hermana, me importa una mierda.

translation.en: Understood?
- Yeah. - Yeah.
- Yes. - He said, do you understand?
- Yes! - What you standing here for? Move!
Oi, Cass.
Yo, Cutz.
Big Kees. What you saying, bruv?
- What's happening? You all right? - Yeah, man. What you saying?
Nothing, man, I just wanted to ask you a little question.
translation.es: Nada, hombre, solo quería hacerte una pregunta. Si alguien te pusiera un revólver en la cara así...

translation.en: You see, if someone put a gun to your fucking face like this here, huh?
translation.es: Si alguien te pusiera un revólver en la cara así...

translation.en: And said, Give me names,
would you do it?
No?
Or if it was a car and it was burning?
translation.es: ¿O si fuera un coche y estuviera en llamas?

translation.en: Would you do that? Would you drop my name?
- What about Ellman? - Of course not.
translation.es: - ¿Qué hay de Ellman? - Claro que no.

translation.en: It doesn't make sense.
Eugene and-- They've been nicked.
And nothing happened to you.
translation.es: Y a ti no te pasó nada.

translation.en: - I'm confused as well. - You're confused?
It's cool, man. Do your thing.
translation.es: Está bien, amigo. Haz lo tuyo.

translation.en: You're all right, man. You're good, man.
Knock, knock.
Take everything. I don't care if it's an old school Game Boy. You get it.
translation.es: Llévense todo. No me importa si es un Game Boy viejo, llévenselo.

translation.en: Really, bruv?
There were four lads who pushed their way in.
translation.es: Había cuatro tipos que entraron a la fuerza.

translation.en: They looked threatening. They were tall, like that.
translation.es: Eran amenazadores. Eran altos, algo así.

translation.en: All in black, you know, hoods up and stuff and...
translation.es: Estaban de negro, con capucha y demás y...

translation.en: They was asking for everything electric.
translation.es: Me pidieron todo lo que fuera eléctrico.

translation.en: They took my phone, took my laptop.
translation.es: Se llevaron mi teléfono, mi computadora.

translation.en: They took the bloody TV and all.
Went into my grandson's...
translation.es: Entraron al cuarto de mi nieto...

translation.en: I mean, I- I've never met the guy...
...like we were talking about last week, we were saying...
- You found him? - Either that or we scared him off.
translation.es: - ¿Lo encontraron? - O lo encontramos o lo asustamos.

translation.en: I ain't heard nothing for days, so I reckon it's over, boss.
translation.es: Hace días que no tengo noticias de él. Creo que se acabó, jefe.

translation.en: All right, I'll get a new delivery in. Go to the yard tonight to pick it up.
translation.es: Bien, ve a buscar una nueva entrega. Te veo en la entrega de esta noche.

translation.en: - We can't afford any more trouble. - Leave it to me, boss.
translation.es: - No podemos tener más problemas. - Déjemelo a mí, jefe.

translation.en: Got ya.
You're not leaving until you tell me exactly where you're going.
translation.es: No te irás hasta que no me digas exactamente adónde vas.

translation.en: I'm not a kid anymore. I don't have to tell you everything.
translation.es: Ya no soy un niño. No tengo que decirte todo.

translation.en: You know, I see your mom in you when I look at you.
translation.es: ¿Sabes? Cuando te veo, veo a tu mamá.

translation.en: - She was a junkie. - She was your mother. And she was my daughter.
translation.es: - Era una drogadicta. - Era tu madre, y era mi hija.

translation.en: She made mistakes, but she was kind.
And she was good. She loved you.
She didn't know how to cope, and I should have been there for her.
translation.es: Pero no supo cómo lidiar con todo, y yo debí estar para ella.

translation.en: So, I will say to you what I wished I had said to her.
translation.es: Así que te diré lo que desearía haberle dicho.

translation.en: I love you.
Come home.
Don't wait up.
Yay!
You all right, sweetheart? Looking for some business?
I got a tenner somewhere. Could do with a little sucky- suck.
translation.es: Tengo diez por algún lado, me vendría bien una chupadita.

translation.en: Why don't you take that tenner and shove it up your ass, my darling?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no tomas tus diez y te los metes en el trasero?

translation.en: I knew your granddad back in the day. We used to call him The Pencil.
translation.es: Conocí a tu abuelo de joven. Le decíamos El Lápiz. ¿Me entiendes?

translation.en: - Know what I mean? -
Shut up, man.
- Ms. Harvey. - Yeah, Danny, can I have a word?
Tell me, have you noticed Tom behaving oddly recently?

translation.en: He's always been odd, but...
translation.es: Dime, ¿notaste que Tom se comporta raro últimamente? Siempre fue raro, pero...

translation.en: Yeah, he's been different since the accident.
translation.es: Sí, desde el accidente está distinto.

translation.en: - It wasn't an accident. - No, I suppose not.
translation.es: - No fue un accidente. - No, supongo que no.

translation.en: But, yeah, he has changed. He...
He's angry, and I... I don't know what he's gonna do.
translation.es: Está enojado, y no sé qué hará.

translation.en: But I do know I don't want him to get hurt anymore,
translation.es: Pero sé que no quiero que se vuelva a hacer daño.

translation.en: so will you look out for him, Danny?
Yeah, yeah. Of course, I will, Ms. Harvey. I'll definitely do that.
translation.es: - ¿Lo cuidarás, Danny? - Sí. Claro que sí, Sra. Harvey. Definitivamente lo haré.

translation.en: You're a good boy. Thanks.
Shit.
The accident there that's left much of the A12 between Blackwall Tunnel and...

Hit your opponent in the chest.

Follow through the strike.
Get on him.
- Till he's dead! - Step him out!
Knock this shit out!
At first, everything was perfect until I fell pregnant.
translation.es: Al principio, todo era perfecto, hasta que quedé embarazada.

translation.en: Tell me more, sweetheart, because you're the one I feel sorry for.
translation.es: Cuéntame más, cariño, porque lo siento mucho por ti. Para una embarazada, por ejemplo, todo empieza a ser diferente.

translation.en: Well, when I got pregnant with my daughter, everything started to get depressing.
translation.es: Para una embarazada, por ejemplo, todo empieza a ser diferente.

translation.en: It was hard at first. Then it started--
Nice of you to show up, Tom.
translation.es: Qué amable de tu parte aparecer, Tom.

translation.en: - I know. I'm... I'm sorry I wasn't there. - No, listen.
translation.es: Lo sé, yo... - Lamento no haber ido. - No, escucha.

translation.en: You said you would come with me. You said that.
translation.es: Dijiste que vendrías conmigo. Lo dijiste.

translation.en: - I know. I'm sorry. - Forget it.
Look, I'm sorry. I've been busy.
- I promise you, I'll make it up to you. - Busy?
translation.es: - Te prometo que te lo compensaré. - ¿Ocupado?

translation.en: I wish I could explain, but things have been...
translation.es: Ojalá pudiera explicarte, pero las cosas estuvieron...

translation.en: - I haven't been myself. - No, seriously, Tom, just forget it.
translation.es: - No he sido yo mismo. - No, de veras, Tom. Olvídalo.

translation.en: Cass, man.
I've known him since forever.
He was a dickhead, but...
Yeah.
So, what happened to you?
Oh, just... got jumped, that's all.
I haven't seen you around lately.
Been revising.
It's not what I've heard.
My cousin Tia says you haven't been in exams.
translation.es: Mi prima Tia dice que no fuiste a los exámenes.

translation.en: It's a shame, man.
I always thought you'd be the one to go places.
translation.es: Siempre creí que serías el que saldría de aquí.

translation.en: Who killed Cass, Danny?
If you ask me...
I blame that hacker.
He started shit that could only end one way.
translation.es: Empezó algo que solo podía terminar de una manera.

translation.en: - See you around, Tom. - See you around.
Let's cut him down. Take him from the balcony...
Everyone's saying it's iBOY.
translation.es: - Es genial. - iBOY. - Creí que eras tú. - Parece un héroe gay.

translation.en: Why don't you tell me a little bit about what's going on with you?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no me cuentas un poco qué te está pasando?

translation.en: It's just-- this pain in my head-- I just-- I need the pieces--
translation.es: Siento un dolor en la cabeza, solo... Las piezas... Tienen que encontrar la manera...

translation.en: You've gotta find some way-- I just--
translation.es: Las piezas... Tienen que encontrar la manera...

translation.en: - You need to operate. - Well, look--
Just take the pieces out of my fucking brain!
translation.es: Sáquenme las piezas de mi maldito cerebro.

translation.en: Hey, hey. Okay, okay.
There's not a lot that we can do about it.
translation.es: No hay mucho que podamos hacer.

translation.en: These fragments have moved a lot deeper into your brain tissue.
translation.es: Los fragmentos se adentraron más en el tejido cerebral

translation.en: - There's just no safe way that we can-- - What if I pay you?
translation.es: y no hay manera segura de... ¿Y si le pago?

translation.en: Well, then I'd be in private practice,
but I'm afraid I would still have to say no.
translation.es: Pero me temo que aún tendría que decir que no.

translation.en: You've got to help. Things haven't been the same since it's happened.
translation.es: Tiene que ayudarme, las cosas no son iguales desde que esto pasó.

translation.en: Look...
Perhaps, I'm not the kind of doctor that you need to be talking to.
translation.es: Quizá no soy la clase de doctor con la que necesitas hablar.

translation.en: You're gonna need some more milk.
Hello, Wendy.
I've just been reading some of your stories.
translation.es: Estuve leyendo algunas de tus historias.

translation.en: You're a dark horse, aren't you?
Ellman, what the fuck are you doing here?
After all these years, can't we at least be civil?
translation.es: Después de todos estos años, ¿podemos al menos ser corteses?

translation.en: You leave us alone, you fucking bastard!
- Nan! - Cutz.
Really? The granny?
Put her on the bed. Make sure she's breathing.
translation.es: Llévala a la cama. Mira que esté respirando.

translation.en: - Let me see her. - Don't worry, she'll be all right.
translation.es: - Déjame verla. - No te preocupes, estará bien.

translation.en: We'll keep an eye on her.
Cutz is a man with a hammer in a world of china. Know what I mean?
translation.es: Cutz es un hombre con martillo en un mundo de porcelana, ¿me entiendes?

translation.en: Keon, let him go.
- - You're gonna wish you hadn't done that.
Oh, yeah? What are you gonna fucking do, you little prick?
Cutz, enough.
I grew up in this tower block.
My bedroom looked out the same side as this.
translation.es: Mi cuarto daba al mismo lado que este.

translation.en: - View's changed a bit. - What do you want?
translation.es: - La vista cambió un poco. - ¿Qué quieres?

translation.en: To reminisce uninterrupted. Is that okay?
translation.es: Recordar sin que me interrumpan. ¿Está bien?

translation.en: You see, back in the day, when I was in short trousers,
translation.es: En mi época, cuando usaba pantalones cortos,

translation.en: this whole area was a shit- hole.
translation.es: toda esta zona era una mierda.

translation.en: Now, it's just us... in the shadow of millionaires.
translation.es: Ahora solo somos nosotros y la sombra de los millonarios.

translation.en: How many lads from the estate
do you think make it up those skyscrapers, Tom?
translation.es: crees que llegan a esos rascacielos, Tom?

translation.en: We have different towers to climb, don't we?
So...
You called. Here I am. What did you want to say to me?
translation.es: Me llamaste. Aquí estoy. ¿Qué querías decirme?

translation.en: No? These moments are always better in our head, aren't they?
translation.es: ¿No? Estos momentos siempre son mejores en nuestra cabeza, ¿no?

translation.en: The French have a word for it.
translation.es: Los franceses tienen una palabra para esto.

translation.en: But then they have a word for fucking everything.
translation.es: Pero tienen una palabra para todo.

translation.en: - I wanted to hurt you. - Okay, good.
translation.es: - Quería hacerte daño. - Está bien. Bien.

translation.en: - Now, we're getting somewhere. - Not anymore.
translation.es: - Estamos llegando a algo. - Ya no.

translation.en: - You're not worth it. It's over now. - It's pretty far from over, Tom.
translation.es: - No lo vales. Ya terminó. - Está lejos de haber terminado, Tom.

translation.en: You don't call the devil then get upset when he turns up.
translation.es: No llamas al diablo y después te enojas cuando aparece.

translation.en: You're not the devil. You're just a cunt.
translation.es: No eres el diablo, eres solo un imbécil.

translation.en: I suppose I am a bit, yeah.
What was that?
What is it you're doing?
You've got a little look in your eye like you're busy.
translation.es: Tienes una mirada como si estuvieras ocupado.

translation.en: Are you, Tom?
Are you busy little bee?
What you looking for?
Do you know?
I've heard rumors that you can tap into phones with just your mind.
translation.es: Oí rumores de que puedes meterte en los teléfonos con tu mente

translation.en: Break into bank accounts with the click of a finger.
translation.es: y asaltar cuentas bancarias con un dedo.

translation.en: - Sounds a bit far- fetched, doesn't it? - Yeah.
But do you know...  I happen to think...
that it's true?
I wouldn't know anything about that.
Don't do that.
That's the difference between us and them.
translation.es: Esa es la diferencia entre ellos y nosotros.

translation.en: They have a modicum of talent, they shout it from the rooftops.
translation.es: Tienen una pizca de talento y la gritan a los cuatro vientos.

translation.en: Us? We have a talent, we get told to shut up.
translation.es: ¿Nosotros? Tenemos un talento y nos hacen callar.

translation.en: Don't show off. Don't be such a clever bastard.
translation.es: No alardees. No seas un sabelotodo.

translation.en: You're special, Tom. Don't ever, ever pretend that you're not.
translation.es: Eres especial, Tom. Nunca finjas que no lo eres.

translation.en: All right, I'm special.
What's it got to do with you?
My one gift, if I may be so bold, is vision.
translation.es: Mi único don, si me atrevo a decirle así, es la visión.

translation.en: I want to help you fulfill your potential.
translation.es: Quiero ayudarte a realizar tu potencial.

translation.en: I want to give you the opportunity to change the world.
translation.es: Quiero darte la oportunidad de cambiar el mundo.

translation.en: You mean the opportunity to make a lot of money.
translation.es: Quieres decir la oportunidad de ganar mucho dinero.

translation.en: - An obscene amount of money. - I'll pass.
translation.es: - Una cantidad obscena de dinero. - Paso.

translation.en: - Why? - 'Cause go fuck yourself, that's why.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué? - Porque vete a la mierda, por eso.

translation.en: Hey, hey, hey.
Okay.
Okay. Well...
It was worth a shot.
I've spent a lot of money bailing my boys out of police custody,
translation.es: Gasté mucho dinero sacando a mis chicos de la cárcel,

translation.en: so you owe me.
Now, I want you to ask yourself one very important question.
translation.es: Ahora quiero que te hagas una pregunta muy importante.

translation.en: Where, oh, where is Lucy?
You see her, don't you?
She's got nothing to do with any of this.
translation.es: Ella no tiene nada que ver con esto.

translation.en: That's entirely up to you.
I don't like this.
Next time, get a note from your fucking mom or something.
translation.es: La próxima consigue una nota de tu mamá o algo.

translation.en: - I can't kill no girl. - It ain't gonna come to that!
translation.es: - No puedo matar a una chica. - No llegará a eso.

translation.en: - Yeah, what if it does? - I'm right here, you know.
Yeah, we see you.
What, just like you've seen me every fucking day since nursery?
translation.es: ¿Qué? Como me viste todos los días desde jardín de infantes.

translation.en: Does that mean nothing?
Come on, Ant.
We grew up together.
Our moms used to walk us home from school together.
translation.es: Volvíamos juntos de la escuela con tu mamá.

translation.en: We used to play in that little park by the estate?
translation.es: Jugábamos en el parque de la urbanización.

translation.en: - Fuck this, man! - Oi, gag her or something, Haz.
translation.es: - A la mierda con esto. - Ponle una venda en la boca, Haz.

translation.en: I can't listen to her shit anymore, man.
- So, how does it work, then? - I woke up with it after they shot me.
translation.es: ¿Cómo funciona? Me desperté así cuando me dispararon.

translation.en: - You get shot and you get super powers. - Yes.
translation.es: - Te disparan y tienes superpoderes. - Sí.

translation.en: - Most people just get dead. - Lucky, I guess.
translation.es: - La mayoría muere. - Tuve suerte, supongo.

translation.en: That's yet to be established.
- So go on. Show me what you can do. - I won't steal for you.
translation.es: - Vamos, muéstrame qué puedes hacer. - No robaré para ti.

translation.en: I think you probably might, though.
You're gonna do what I say, or I'm gonna burn your world down.
translation.es: Harás lo que te diga o destruiré tu mundo.

translation.en: Danny, can you come in here, please?
It was young Daniel here who first suggested
translation.es: El joven Daniel fue quien primero sugirió

translation.en: you might be our masked man.
translation.es: que tú podrías ser nuestro enmascarado.

translation.en: And do you know? He didn't even want to be here to see if he was right.
translation.es: Y ni siquiera quería estar aquí para saber si tenía razón.

translation.en: - How long have you known Danny? - My whole life.
translation.es: - ¿Hace cuánto conoces a Danny? - Toda la vida.

translation.en: Your whole life.
I've never even met the guy and yet, he gave you up to me.
translation.es: Ni siquiera lo conocía, y sin embargo te entregó.

translation.en: Do you know why?
Little pictures of the Queen.
translation.es: Las pequeñas fotos de la reina.

translation.en: If you're gonna betray a friend, look him in the eye while you do it.
translation.es: Si vas a traicionar a un amigo, míralo a los ojos cuando lo haces.

translation.en: Little pictures of Elizabeth.
Open your mouth, Danny.
Open your fucking mouth.
In case you're wondering, that's what power looks like.
translation.es: Por si te preguntas, esto es tener poder.

translation.en: Now...
You're gonna put funds into my bank account...
translation.es: Agregarás fondos a mi cuenta bancaria,

translation.en: because I know you can do it,
and I know you're not gonna let me do the things I'm willing to do if you don't.
translation.es: y sé que no me dejarás hacer lo que puedo hacer si no lo haces.

translation.en: Give me your phone, Danny.
Now, fuck off.
Okay, none of us are getting any younger. Let's get this done.
translation.es: No nos hacemos más jóvenes. Hagámoslo.

translation.en: Be a dear and fill her up, will you?
Is that as fast as you can go?
translation.es: ¿Es lo más rápido que puedes ir?

translation.en: I could just dump the entire Bank of England in there, but...
translation.es: Podría pasarle el Banco de Inglaterra entero,

translation.en: I think people might start asking questions.
translation.es: pero creo que podrían empezar a hacer preguntas.

translation.en: You see, I still like this guy despite everything.
translation.es: Aún me agrada este tipo, a pesar de todo.

translation.en: You're a special kid, Tom.
A special kid.
Looks like we're doing it.
I'm gonna put an X on it.
Yeah?
Whoever gets the X has got to do it. Put your hands out.
translation.es: Al que le toque la X tiene que hacerlo. Abran las manos.

translation.en: Are you fucking kidding me?
- What'd you expect-- ? - Don't talk to her.
Well, I wouldn't shoot an unarmed girl tied to a chair.
translation.es: Bueno, no le dispararía a una chica desarmada atada a una silla.

translation.en: Shut up.
But I guess I'm not a big man like you, Eugene.
translation.es: Supongo que no soy un gran hombre como tú, Eugene.

translation.en: Shut up! Just shut the fuck up!
Why don't you just fucking do it, then? Isn't that what you want?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no lo haces tú? ¿No es lo que quieres?

translation.en: - Hey, yo, calm down, man. Come on, man. - Don't test me, man!
- Chill, mate! Chill, man! - Get the fuck off me!
- Help! - Hurry up!
- Shut up. -
- We gotta fucking go, man! - Hurry up, man!
What just happened?
Nothing.
Cutz, check in with the warehouse.
Turn it off.
Fuck.
No answer, boss.
All right, let's take this on the road.
translation.es: Muy bien, hagámoslo en el camino.

translation.en: They're gone. Oi, they're gone.
That was fucking close, bruv.
Oh, shit. You fucked up.
Tom... of the Crowley Estate Harpers.
translation.es: Tom, de la urbanización Crowley Harpers.

translation.en: I knew your mum back in the day. She was a good time girl.
translation.es: Conocí a tu mamá. Era una chica divertida.

translation.en: She could light up a room with her hand jobs.
translation.es: Podía encender un cuarto con sus pajas.

translation.en: You must have been, what, three when she died?
- Two. - Two?
I knew her well, you know.
Very well.
Gosh, you don't think...
We both certainly like getting into a lot of trouble, don't we?
translation.es: A los dos nos gusta meternos en problemas, ¿no?

translation.en: I wasn't actually gonna kill you, Luce.
translation.es: No iba a matarte de verdad, Luce.

translation.en: - No? - No, no, no, no, no.
Calm down.
I never used to think you could rape me... either, Eugene.
translation.es: Tampoco creía que podrías violarme, Eugene.

translation.en: 'Cause we grew up together.
And we were friends, remember?
- What happened was fucked up, I admit-- - You don't get to talk about it!
translation.es: - Lo que pasó fue jodido, lo admito... - No puedes hablar de eso.

translation.en: Fuck you, Ant!
Fuck all of you!
Tell me you're ashamed.
- I'm ashamed. - Honestly, I'm ashamed.
translation.es: - Estoy avergonzado. - De veras, estoy avergonzado.

translation.en: - I'm ashamed. I swear that I'm ashamed. - No!
You're scared!
If you were ashamed, you wouldn't be able to even look at me.
translation.es: Si estuvieran avergonzados, no podrían ni siquiera mirarme.

translation.en: So, don't fucking look at me!
Get on your knees, all of you.
- Lucy, Lucy-- - Now!
- Lucy, you don't have to do this, please. - I'm sorry. I'm sorry.
translation.es: - ¡Ahora! - Lucy... - No tienes que hacer esto, por favor. - Lo siento.

translation.en: I don't know what happened to you.
Well...
I have to admit I was expecting you to be rather more restrained than this,  young lady.
translation.es: Debo admitir que esperaba que todo estuviera bajo control, jovencita.

translation.en: Boys, can you come out here, please?
You haven't shot them, have you?
Oh, good.
Gentlemen, everything under control? Only, the hostage has got the gun.
translation.es: Caballeros, ¿todo bajo control? Salvo que el rehén tiene el arma.

translation.en: - Lucy! -
Don't fucking move.
Tom?
Natural order is restored.
Come on, Tom, up you get.
By the way, I wanted to apologize personally
for the indignities you had to suffer.
translation.es: por las indignidades que tuviste que sufrir.

translation.en: Young people today...
translation.es: Los jóvenes de hoy en día...

translation.en: Like animals, you know?
I wouldn't like me, either.
Continue.
Come on, Tom.
I'm trying.
A bit of performance anxiety?
Tom?
Come on!
If I gave you the option to walk away, would you take it?
translation.es: Si te diera la opción de irte, ¿lo harías?

translation.en: What?
If I gave you the option to walk away and never come back, would you take it?
translation.es: Si te diera la opción de irte y no volver jamás, ¿lo harías?

translation.en: Why the fuck would I do that?
Just thought I'd ask first.
I've never been more fucking disappointed with anyone in my life.
translation.es: Nunca estuve más decepcionado de alguien en toda mi vida.

translation.en: Maybe you're not that special after all.
translation.es: Quizá no eres tan especial después de todo.

translation.en: No, you are special...
But I'm still gonna kill ya!
Get the fuck away from him, you middle- aged prick!
translation.es: ¡Aléjate de él, imbécil de mediana edad!

translation.en: Stupid little girl.
Back again, Nan?
Oh, Tommy.
What do you want?
Here's the money Ellman gave me.
translation.es: Aquí está el dinero que me dio Ellman.

translation.en: What I did was unforgivable. I know that.
translation.es: Lo que hice fue imperdonable. Lo sé.

translation.en: I know we're done. I just wanted to do right by you.
translation.es: Sé que no seremos más amigos. Solo quise hacer lo correcto.

translation.en: Why? 'Cause we were friends?
Or 'cause you're scared of me?
Keep it. I don't want it.
I reckon you did us all a favor, you know, taking him out.
translation.es: Nos hiciste un favor a todos eliminándolo.

translation.en: I'm just saying, I know you're probably beating yourself up about it,
translation.es: Solo digo, sé que probablemente te estás atormentando por eso,

translation.en: but, guys like that, they gotta get got.
translation.es: pero los tipos así deben ser atrapados.

translation.en: You know, Danny, I was thinking, I went after everyone in that video,
translation.es: ¿Sabes, Danny? Estaba pensando. Perseguí a todos los del video,

translation.en: but I didn't stop to think about who was filming.
translation.es: pero no me detuve a pensar en quién estaba grabando.

translation.en: Maybe you'll get him yet.
Peace, Tom.
Yo.
Give it to you down there.
Don't jump.
Unless you can fly now, too.
translation.es: A menos que también puedas volar.

translation.en: Is that another one of your magical powers?
- So, things got pretty mental back there. - People got hurt, Tom.
translation.es: - Estuvo todo bastante loco. - Gente salió herida, Tom.

translation.en: I know.
- I mean, I literally shot a guy. - I'm sorry, Lucy.
translation.es: - Literalmente, le disparé a un tipo. - Lo siento, Lucy.

translation.en: I'm trying to say I'm sorry.
All right.
I forgive you.
I see his face whenever I close my eyes.
translation.es: Cuando cierro los ojos, veo su cara.

translation.en: I see a lot of faces when I close my eyes. I don't know if it ever really goes away.
translation.es: Cuando cierro los ojos, veo muchas caras. No sé si alguna vez se va.

translation.en: But I'll help you if you help me.
translation.es: Pero te ayudaré, si me ayudas.

translation.en: You know, there are restaurants in town.
People go and then other people cook for them. It's really great.
translation.es: La gente va y otras personas cocinan para ellos. Es genial. Deberías probarlo.

translation.en: - You should try it. -
The view's pretty good, though.
So, are you gonna stick around, then?
In case you need me?
In case I want you.
